Description: Number of user-generated transcriptions attached to the representation.
Number of pages in a multipage document. Will be null when not applicable.
Number of previews available for a multipage document ot timebased media. Will be null when not applicable. This is a synonym for page_count
Pixel dimensions for the media, formatted for display.
Options: version = version to use. Default is original.

Description: Duration of timebased media, formatted for display.
Options:
durationFormat = Sets format of duration. Use "delimited" for delimited format, "hms" for hours/minutes/seconds, "hm" for hours/minutes and "seconds" for output in seconds. Default is "hms".
version = version to use. Default is original.

Description: General type of originally uploaded media. Possible values are "image", "video", "audio", and "document".
Format of originally uploaded media, for display.
File size of media, formatted for display.
Options: version = version to use. Default is original.

Description: Colorspace of media, formatted for display.
Options: version = version to use. Default is original.

Description: Pixel resolution of media, formatted for display. May not be available for all file formats
Options: version = version to use. Default is original.

Description: Bit depth of media, formatted for display. May not be available for all file formats.
Options: version = version to use. Default is original.

Description: X-coordinate of user-set center crop point for image media. Coordinate is a decimal fraction of the width of the image.
Y-coordinate of user-set center crop point for image media. Coordinate is a decimal fraction of the width of the image.
